original_title: Heart - Live at the Royal Albert Hall with The Royal Philharmonic Orchestra
overview: Live performance from American rock band Heart, recorded in June 2016 at the Royal Albert Hall in London. Accompanied by the Royal Philharmonic Orchestra, the show features classic tracks including 'Magic Man', 'Crazy On You' and 'Barracuda'.
title: Heart - Live at the Royal Albert Hall with The Royal Philharmonic Orchestra
